Title: Antem
Description: BioWareAnthem is an online multiplayer action role-playing video game developed by BioWare
BigDescription:
Initial release date: January 25 2019
Composer: Sarah Schachner
Designer: Preston Watamaniuk
Engine: Frostbite
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Developers: BioWare Austin LLC
Platforms: PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows

Title: FarCry 5
Description: Far Cry 5 is a 2018 first-person shooter, developed by Ubisoft Montreal and Ubisoft Toronto and published by Ubisoft. It is the successor to 2014's Far Cry 4, and the fifth main installment in the Far Cry series.
BigDescription:
Initial release date: March 26, 2018
Publisher: Ubisoft
Composer: Dan Romer
Mode: Multiplayer video game
Platforms: Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Microsoft Windows, Xbox Cloud Gaming, Google Stadia, Amazon Luna
Engine: Dunia Engine, CryEngine
Nominations: BAFTA Games Award for Music, The Game Award for Best Action Game

Title: Gears of War
Description: Gears of War, also known simply as Gears, is a media franchise centered on a series of video games created by Epic Games, developed and managed by The Coalition, and owned and published by Xbox Game Studios. Wikipedia
BigDescription:
Platform(s): Xbox 360; Microsoft Windows; Xbox One; iOS; Xbox Series X/S
Publishers: Microsoft Corporation, Xbox Game Studios
Developers: Epic Games, The Coalition, Xbox Game Studios, MORE
Designers: Cliff Bleszinski, Ryan Cleven, Matthew Searcy
Nominations: VGX Award for Strongest Heroes of All Time
Awards: VGX Award for Strongest Heroes of All Time

Title: Star Wars
Description: Star Wars: The Old Republic is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game based in the Star Wars universe. Developed by BioWare Austin and a supplemental team at BioWare Edmonton, the game was announced on October 21, 2008. Wikipedia
BigDescription:
Initial release date: December 20, 2011
Engine: HeroEngine
Series: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
Developers: BioWare, Electronic Arts, Bioware Austin LLC
Platform: Microsoft Windows
Publishers: Electronic Arts, Lucasarts
Composers: Gordy Haab, Mark Griskey

Title: Minecraft
Description: Minecraft is a block game, very fun lol
BigDescription:
